languages.text: "Лорд Моллес, признанный живым, совершил прегрешение мягкосердечия в управлении семейным делом. Он даровал вольную всем осужденным рабочим и расторг договоры с главными поставщиками, мотивируя это решение их моральными качествами. Его усилиями на местах недосчитались двенадцати килотонн пайков".

"Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."
languages.original_text: "Лорд Моллес, признанный живым, совершил прегрешение мягкосердечия в управлении семейным делом. Он даровал вольную всем осужденным рабочим и расторг договоры с главными поставщиками, мотивируя это решение их моральными качествами. Его усилиями на местах недосчитались двенадцати килотонн пайков".

He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

"Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

languages.text: "Lord Molles, der für am Leben gehalten wurde, erlitt bei der Führung seines Familienunternehmens einen Anfall von Weichherzigkeit. Er ließ alle seine verurteilten Arbeiter frei und kündigte die Verträge mit seinen Hauptzulieferern wegen moralischer Bedenken. Sein Handeln führte zu zwölf Kilotonnen nicht ausgelieferter Essensrationen bei mehreren Empfängern."
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Molles, der für am Leben gehalten wurde, erlitt bei der Führung seines Familienunternehmens einen Anfall von Weichherzigkeit. Er ließ alle seine verurteilten Arbeiter frei und kündigte die Verträge mit seinen Hauptzulieferern wegen moralischer Bedenken. Sein Handeln führte zu zwölf Kilotonnen nicht ausgelieferter Essensrationen bei mehreren Empfängern."

languages.text: « Le seigneur Molles, toujours en vie, a malheureusement fait preuve de sensibilité en gérant son entreprise familiale. Il s'est séparé de tous ses ouvriers reconnus coupables et a rompu ses contrats avec ses fournisseurs principaux en raison de leur immoralité. Ses actions ont entraîné la non-distribution de douze kilotonnes de rations alimentaires à plusieurs destinataires. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Molles, toujours en vie, a malheureusement fait preuve de sensibilité en gérant son entreprise familiale. Il s'est séparé de tous ses ouvriers reconnus coupables et a rompu ses contrats avec ses fournisseurs principaux en raison de leur immoralité. Ses actions ont entraîné la non-distribution de douze kilotonnes de rations alimentaires à plusieurs destinataires. »

languages.text: “莫莱斯勋爵恢复了原本的身份，但在经营家族企业的过程中犯了心软的罪过。他释放了所有被定罪的工人，同时终止了与那些主要供应商的合同，理由是这些人的道德品质有问题。他的行为导致生产额度出现了12000吨的短缺，需要口粮的单位未能收到应得份额。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

traits.locale_text: “莫莱斯勋爵恢复了原本的身份，但在经营家族企业的过程中犯了心软的罪过。他释放了所有被定罪的工人，同时终止了与那些主要供应商的合同，理由是这些人的道德品质有问题。他的行为导致生产额度出现了12000吨的短缺，需要口粮的单位未能收到应得份额。”

languages.text: «Lord Molles, declarado vivo, cometió una transgresión por piedad al mando de la empresa familiar. Liberó a todos sus trabajadores convictos y puso fin a los contratos con sus principales proveedores debido a sus cualidades morales. Como resultado de sus actos, fue imposible entregar un total de doce kilotones de comida entre distintos destinatarios».
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Molles, declarado vivo, cometió una transgresión por piedad al mando de la empresa familiar. Liberó a todos sus trabajadores convictos y puso fin a los contratos con sus principales proveedores debido a sus cualidades morales. Como resultado de sus actos, fue imposible entregar un total de doce kilotones de comida entre distintos destinatarios».

languages.text: 「生存が確認されているモレス公は、家業を経営するにあたり情に流されるというあやまちを犯しました。彼は有罪判決を受けた労働者全員を解放し、主要な供給業者との契約を道徳的な理由で打ち切りました。その結果、複数の受給者に対して計12キロトンの食料配給が届かなくなりました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."

traits.locale_text: 「生存が確認されているモレス公は、家業を経営するにあたり情に流されるというあやまちを犯しました。彼は有罪判決を受けた労働者全員を解放し、主要な供給業者との契約を道徳的な理由で打ち切りました。その結果、複数の受給者に対して計12キロトンの食料配給が届かなくなりました」

languages.text: "Hayatta olduğu tespit edilen Lord Molles, ailesinin işletmesini idare ederken aşırı yumuşak başlı davrandı. Mahkûm işçileri serbest bıraktı, başlıca tedarikçileriyle olan sözleşmeleri onların ahlaki kusurları gerekçesiyle iptal etti. Eylemlerinin sonucunda hedef bölgelere teslim edilemeyen on iki kilotonluk erzak kaybı yaşandı."
languages.original_text: "Lord Molles, deemed to be alive, committed a transgression of softheartedness in running his family enterprise. He released all his convicted workers and terminated the contracts with his primary suppliers, citing their moral qualities. His actions resulted in twelve kilotons of undelivered food rations across several recipients."
